subtitleNullable: Ethereum cryptocurrency price trend - 10 Mar 2016 to 12 May 2021
descriptionNullable:
### Ethereum price dataset
If you reach this DATASET, please UPVOTE this dataset to show your appreciation

Ethereum (ETH) is a smart contract platform that enables developers to build decentralized applications (DAPs) conceptualized in Vitalik Buterin 2013. ETH is the local currency of the Ethereum platform and also serves as a transaction fee for miners in the Ethereum network.

Ethereum is the pioneer of blockchain-based smart contracts. Smart contract becomes a self-operating computer program when running on the blockchain, which automatically executes when certain conditions are met. On the blockchain, smart contracts allow the code to be programmed without the possibility of useless time, censorship, fraud or third party interference. It facilitates the conversion of money, content, property, shares or anything valuable. Ethereum Network went live on July 30, 2015 with 72 million Ethereum Premium.


##Column descriptors
1. Date - As on Date of the price information
2. Price - Shows the current price in INR as on date. 
3. Open - Opening price of the day's trading session.
4. High - Highest price of the day's trading session.
5. Low -Lowest price of the day's trading session.
6. Close - Closing price of the day's trading session.
7. Volume - Volume of the crypto token as on date.
8. % change - change in the price percentage during the day.

## Data insights
This is the price trend extracted from the internet through web scraping for the period of 10 March 2016 to 12 May 2021.


## Inspiration

Predicting the price and the trend in short, medium and long term has been very tricky lately due to lack of historical data and analysis, and the failure of traditional fundamental and technical analysis techniques on cryptocurrencies.

### Challenge
I challenge the data scientists and machine learning experts to take up this challenge using this dataset.
I would be shortly adding data for other booming cryptocurrencies shortly.
